abstract.text: A session for an in-progress activity that synchronizes content among participant devices.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: A
object contains details about the user’s currently selected
activity, its status, and its participants. When a participant engages in an
activity, the system binds a session to that activity for you.
You use the session object to synchronize your app’s activity-related content,
including your app’s UI.
You don’t create
objects directly. Instead, the system creates
sessions and makes them available to your app asynchronously.
Use the
type returned by the
method
of your activity to retrieve new sessions when they become
available.
Before the system can create a session object, your app must create a
object and activate it. For information about how to configure group activities,
see
When you receive a new session object, it’s initially in the
state.
As soon as your app is ready to begin the associated activity, call the session’s
method. Joining a session validates the connection and starts the
synchronization process between the current device and other participants’
devices. If your app successfully joins the session, the session transitions
to the
state.
When the user quits your app, or navigates away from the shared activity, call
the session’s
method. Leaving a session gracefully transitions it
to the
state, and informs the system
that the user isn’t currently engaged in the activity.

abstract.text: Create app-specific activities your users can share and experience together.
A type that assigns a custom ID string to messages you send to other devices.
A type that can advertise your app’s activities to other participants.
Returns the sessions for this activity as an asynchronous sequence.
A session for an in-progress activity that synchronizes content among participant devices.
A session-related event to display in the system UI.
The type of publisher that emits before the object has changed.
An asynchronous sequence of sessions you use to manage a specific activity.
The possible states of a session.
A state that indicates the session is no longer valid and can’t be used
for shared activities.
An active state that indicates the session allows data synchronization between devices.
An idle state that indicates the session is waiting for the app to join the activity.
The set of participants currently engaged in the activity.
The current activity associated with the session.
A textual representation of this instance.
Ends the activity for the entire group and stops the transfer
of synchronized data.
The unique identifier of the current session.
A Boolean value that is true if the current session was created by the local participant.
Starts the shared activity on the current device.
Leaves the current activity and stops receiving synchronized data.
The participant on the current device.
Posts an event to the system, which displays the information in
the system UI.
Tells the system that your app needs to be in the foreground to continue an activity.
The persistent identifier of the session’s associated scene.
Posts an event to the system, which displays the information in
the system UI.
The current state of the session.
The system coordinator associated with an active session.
A session-related event that appears in the system UI.
An active participant in a group session.
Update your SharePlay activities to support spatial Personas and
the shared context when running in visionOS.

doc://com.apple.GroupActivities/document.title: Adding spatial Persona support to an activity

abstract.text: Configure the session when a SharePlay activity starts, and handle events
that occur during the lifetime of the activity.

doc://com.apple.GroupActivities/document.title: Joining and managing a shared activity

abstract.text: Send custom messages and data between devices to synchronize content for
your activity, and incorporate messages your app receives from other
participants.

doc://com.apple.GroupActivities/document.title: Synchronizing data during a SharePlay activity

abstract.text: Invite your friends to draw on a shared canvas while on a FaceTime call.

doc://com.apple.documentation/documentat.title: Drawing content in a group session

abstract.text: A type of object with a publisher that emits before the object has changed.
A type with a customized textual representation.
A type whose values can be implicitly or explicitly copied.
